attributes.action: Ban Naming & Shaming on all social media platforms
attributes.additional_details: This form of cyber bullying has caused individuals severe mental stress, sometimes even suicidle thoughts.Naming & Shaming is a invasion of one’s privacy.No one should have the right to use this as weapon for malicious intent to disturb one’s life.
attributes.background: Naming & Shaming online is a form of cyber bullying.it’s causes severe mental stress & it allows individuals to use it as a weapon to degrade, embarrass & Tarnish individuals reputation.The government need to put laws into place to stop this form of cyber bullying.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, for example making it illegal to share personal information about people online without their consent.
